name: Hectic Space
description:
"Hectic Space makes blasting aliens feel as good as blasting phat techno beatz" - 4/5 148Apps.com

"Hectic Space is a charming little game that captures the craziness and fun of old arcade titles" - 5/5 cultofmac.com

*** Hectic Space is now Premium ***
No more ads, no more inapp-purchase. Just one small price to enjoy hectic gaming.

Watch enemies shatter into glorious pixels in this intense retro style arcade shooter.
Collect insane power ups, reflect enemy bullets with shields and make sure you keep your combo going!
Random enemy patterns keep things fresh, along side a pumping arcade soundtrack.

Easy touch control for precise movement.
